name: PulseQAC
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: call my charger
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using PulseQ AC skills and Alexa to charge electric vehicles at home is very simple. Just tell Alexa to start charging your car and check your charging status.
Using PulseQ AC skills and Alexa, you can:
Start and stop charging the car
Stop charging your car
Check charging status
You need a PulseQ AC home charger connected to WiFi and Alexa to charge your car. You can only connect one PulseQ AC account to Alexa.
If you haven't already done so, please use the PulseQ AC Home application to find radio stations near you at www.topdon.com.
If you have a charging device called PulseQ AC. Open the connection session through [Alexa Call my charger], start charging through [turn on charging], start charging through [stop charging], and check the charging status of the device being charged through [check charging status].
Alexa Call my charger
turn on charging
start Charging
stop charging
turn off the charging post
Check charing status
